@head:
<meta charset="UTF-8" />
<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge" />
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
<title>{{ meta.title }}</title>
<meta name="description" content="{{ meta.description }}" />
<meta name="keywords" content="{{ meta.keywords }}" />
<meta name="author" content="SUMAQ websites">
@_preview:
{{{yield}}}

Header
@go-down: {{#if goDown}} {{else}} {{/if}}
@go-up: {{#if goUp }} {{else}} {{/if}}
@menu-icon:
<button id="menu-icon" class="menu-icon" onclick="this.classList.toggle('opened');">
  <svg viewBox="0 0 100 100">
    {{!-- <line x1="10" y1="10" x2="90" y2="90" stroke="#fff" stroke-width="10"></line>
    <line x1="10" y1="90" x2="90" y2="10" stroke="#fff" stroke-width="10"></line> --}}
    <line x1="10" y1="10" x2="90" y2="10" class="line top" ></line>
    <line x1="10" y1="50" x2="90" y2="50" class="line middle" ></line>
    <line x1="10" y1="90" x2="90" y2="90" class="line bottom"></line>
  </svg>
</button>
@carousel:
{{#if carousel}} {{#with carousel}}
{{#each items}}
{{> @image-responsive}} {{#with caption}}
{{#if pretitle}}

{{pretitle}}

{{/if}}

{{title}}

{{#if subtitle}}

{{subtitle}}

{{/if}}

{{description}}

{{/with}}
{{/each}}
{{#each items}} {{/each}}
{{/with}} {{else}} {{> @data-not-found data='carousel'}} {{/if}}
@contact-simple:
{{#if contact }}

{{ contact._input.title }}

{{else}} {{> @data-not-found data='contact'}} {{/if}}
